A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A touch of humor\, twists I honestly didn't see coming\, and solid performances. I loved it. It's not perfect. Those that didn't like the callbacks in the first movie will not like them here\, but it's a lighter touch.  I liked how they set the usual story-telling of these kinds of movies a bit on it's head. Go in with no expectations and you'll be happier.
